sourcesContent:
<template>


    <b-form-input
            v-uppercase
            v-model="formattedreferenceValue"
            type="text"
            required
            @keyup="focusOut"
            @blur="focusOut"
            placeholder="LT00215212"
    ></b-form-input>

</template>

<script>
    export default {

        data() {
            return {
                referenceValue: 0,
                preventNextIteration: false,
                formattedreferenceValue: ''
            };
        },
        methods: {
            focusOut: function(event) {
                if (['Arrow', 'Backspace', 'Shift'].includes(event.key)) {
                    this.preventNextIteration = true;
                    return;
                }
                if (this.preventNextIteration) {
                    this.preventNextIteration = false;
                    return;
                }

                //this.referenceValue = this.formattedreferenceValue.replace(/\s/g, '').match(/([a-zA-Z0-9])/g)[0];
                this.referenceValue = this.formattedreferenceValue.replace(/[^a-zA-Z0-9]/g, "");
                this.formattedreferenceValue = this.referenceValue.toUpperCase()

                this.$emit('setreference',this.formattedreferenceValue)

                //this.referenceValue = this.formattedreferenceValue.replace(/-/g, '').match(/([a-zA-Z0-9]{10})/g)[0];
                // Format display value based on calculated currencyValue
                //this.formattedreferenceValue = this.referenceValue.replace(/(\d{1,3})(\d{1,3})(\d{1,4})/g, '$1-$2-$3');

               // this.formattedreferenceValue = this.referenceValue.replace(/(\w*)/,/(\U$1)/); //eslint-disable-line


                /*this.phoneValue = this.formattedPhoneValue.replace(/-/g, '').match(/(\d{1,10})/g)[0];

						// Format display value based on calculated currencyValue
            this.formattedPhoneValue = this.phoneValue.replace(/(\d{1,3})(\d{1,3})(\d{1,4})/g, '$1-$2-$3');*/
            }
        }
    };
</script>
